GeneDef.label: ocular affinity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special connection to the ocular trees, allowing them to act as an amplifier to the special properties of the tree, giving them access to powerful innate psychic abilities.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Guarantees Natural Meditation focus on the pawn.
If Alpha Animals OR Alpha Biomes are present, they'll get an ocular conversion ability.
